archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1439
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Vodafone AM, I want to be able to share documents with customers, both send and receive, in a secure way that the customer and I can access together

properties.value: SC, EP: Link to external CMS or documents can be handled within SC/EP. However send/receive function for files does not exist.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
